column4: Hello all, who here knows how to get MySql running if I couldn't get it from the ubuntu documentation
dad@HPToilet:~$ sudo mysqladmin -u root password newrootsqlpassword
mysqladmin: connect to server at 'localhost' failed
error: 'Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)'
this is not a paste bin?
can you log in to mysql directly?
did you try sudo mysql -u root -p password ?
next I would just try sudo mysql
you mean you just downloaded mysql?
alright well you can reset it
kill the current mysql process and restart it with /usr/bin/safe_mysql --skip-grant-tables&
you should be able to log into mysql if you are in safe
